name: Harvest Homes
description:
Harvest Homes

Ludum Dare 52 - Page

Controls

E - interact

Tab - Open Inventory

Space - Jump

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

 

Thank you for playing Harvest Homes! This game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52

Our Team "Umbra" includes:

Adam - Original Music/Soundtrack

Brett - Programmer

Mykyta - Programmer, UI (BJNick)

Crystal - Layouts and art 

Sarah - Art, research, code for dialog 

Sara - Art, story writer.
